thead.title: Categoria de Chapa
thead.htmlDefault: <select name="cat"> <option selected="" hidden="">Chapas planas</option> <option value="ff">Finas a frio</option> <option value="fq">Finas a quente</option> <option value="cg">Chapas grossas</option> <option value="cx">Chapas de piso</option> <option value="cg">Chapas galvanizadas</option> </select>

thead.title: Perfil
thead.htmlDefault: <select name="perfil"> <option selected="" hidden="">Perfil</option> <option value="perfilU">Perfil U simples</option> <option value="perfilUE">Perfil U enrijecido</option></select>
